Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk and Western: due to, police activity near Western/Harrison.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Emerald
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Halsted, 55th, Union, and 59th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near 59th/Emerald.

Allow extra travel time.
